#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
 
int cf (const void *, const void *);
 
int main()
{
   int t, d, n, a[100];
   
   scanf("%d", &t);
   
   for (d = 1; d <= t; d++) {
     
      int e, sum;
      
      scanf("%d", &n);
      
      for (e = 0; e < n; e++)
         scanf("%d", &a[e]);
     
      qsort(a, n, sizeof(int), cf);
      
      sum = a[n-3] + a[n-2] + a[n-1];
      printf("Case %d: %d\n", d, sum);
   }
   
   return 0;
}
 
int cf (const void * a, const void * b)
{
   return ( *(int*)a - *(int*)b );
}
